entry.title: Listening without interrupting, correcting…
entry.content: “Listening without interrupting, correcting, contradicting, getting highly excited, questioning, spacing out, or giving advice is one of the deepest spiritual practices anyone can explore.”

entry.title: Tomorrow owes you the sum of your yesterdays…

link.title: Tomorrow owes you the sum of your yesterdays…

entry.content: “Tomorrow owes you the sum of your yesterdays. No more than that. … And no less. Sometimes folk wish tomorrow did not pay them off so completely.”
